title: GOOGLE LOCK AND ERASE FUCNTION -- RECOVERY?! My account was hacked and the hacker wiped out my pics!
content: IS THERE ANY WAY I CAN STILL RECOVER MY PHOTOS AND VIDEOS?! MY ACCOUNT WAS HACKED FROM A DIFF PHONE AND USED TO ACCESS MY PHONE. IT USED TO THE LOCK AND ERASE FUNCTION. LATER ON, I FOUND OUT IT WAS SOMEONE I KNOW.  I WAS ABLE TO USE MY PHONE AGAIN BUT ALL THE PHOTOS AND VIDS ARE GONE!!!!!! THIS IS A VERY STUPID FUNCTION!!!!!!
